        strVal
      • strVal(r: TFullReg): untyped
        strVal=
      • strVal=(r: TFullReg; s: string)
      • strVal=(r: TFullReg; s: VmString)
  • Exports
  Source   Edit

This file implements the new evaluation engine for Nim code. An instruction is 1-3 int32s in memory, it is a register based VM.

Imports

../ast/ast, ../ast/errorhandling, ../ast/errorreporting, ../ast/lineinfos, ../ast/renderer, ../ast/trees, ../ast/idents, ../ast/reports, ../ast/typesrenderer, ../ast/types, ../ast/parser, ../modules/modulegraphs, ../front/options, ../front/msgs, ../front/cli_reporter, ../ic/bitabs, ../utils/debugutils, ../utils/int128, ../utils/btrees, ../utils/bitsets, ../sem/sighashes, ../sem/macrocacheimpl, ../sem/transf, ../sem/passes, ../sem/evaltempl, vmprofiler, gorgeimpl, vmchecks, vmcompilerserdes, vmdeps, vmerrors, vmgen, vmdef, vmhooks, vmmemory, vmobjects, vmops, vmtypegen, vmtypes

Consts
